properties.address: The Wesley Forest Of Dean Community & Arts Centre, Gloucestershire GL14 2AB
properties.description: A space for everyone, we have homemade refreshments ( cakes and baguettes or rolls) along with cuppa soups, a selection of hot and cold drinks, charity raffle, guess the teddy, tombolas adults and kids, for sale table, homemade preserves. we are accessable to everyone. We are there the 1st Wednesday of the month, December onwards
properties.title: Cinderford coffee club

properties.description: Cinderford Library is located on Belle Vue Road and has ramped access with automatic doors. Libraries are traditionally a place where people can go without judgement or cost and we offer a range of core services all year round. What we are offering: •Warm, dry buildings spaces to sit and keep warm •Free access to Wi-Fi and free computer access with a Library membership •Places to charge your devices •Signposting to advice and support •Regular groups, activities and events ranging from jigsaw puzzles to social sessions To find out more about what we offer visit gloucestershire.gov.uk/libraries/warm-and-welcome/. Library Membership is free and you can join online at gloucestershire.gov.uk/libraries/join-the-library/ or visit your local library. Discover and browse events at gloucestershire.spydus.co.uk
properties.title: Cinderford Library

properties.description: Coleford Library is located at the Main Place and has level access. Libraries are traditionally a place where people can go without judgement or cost and we offer a range of core services all year round. What we are offering: •Warm, dry buildings with spaces to sit and keep warm •Free access to Wi-Fi and free computer access with a Library membership •Places to charge your devices •Signposting to advice and support •Regular groups, activities and events ranging from jigsaw puzzles to social sessions To find out more about what we offer visit gloucestershire.gov.uk/libraries/warm-and-welcome/. Library Membership is free and you can join online at gloucestershire.gov.uk/libraries/join-the-library/ or visit your local library. Discover and browse events at gloucestershire.spydus.co.uk
properties.title: Coleford Library

properties.address: WEST DEAN CENTRE HIGH STREET, Bream, England GL15 6JW GL15 6JW
properties.description: Open now We are a warm welcoming space for all age groups. Bream Friends will also be offering crafting activities on Wednesdays afternoons.
properties.title: Kim Carpenter

properties.address: Unit 1 A, Critchcraft Industrial Estate, Bulwark, Chepstow NP16 5QZ NP16 5QZ
properties.description: Welcome to Lads Lunch, a place to meet friends, make friends and enjoy a FREE warm homecooked meal together. Lads Lunch is a space for men who live or work in our local community and for those visiting from further afield. Our kitchen has a 5 rating from the Food Standards Agency. We look forward to seeing you all soon
properties.title: Lads Lunch

properties.description: Free entry and open to all every Monday 10-12 ~ refreshments, homemade cakes, good company and a warm welcome Other Groups and Clubs meet throughout the week at the Hall ~ checkout the webpage for latest details.
properties.title: Ruspidge Community Hub

properties.address: The Chapel Broad Street, Littledean, Gloucestershire GL14 3NH
properties.description: A warm welcoming space to enjoy Tea, Coffee, a Bacon Butty and browse our shelves for free larder food and clothing/toys.
properties.title: Salvation Army @ URC Chapel Littledean

properties.address: Sling & District Recreation Club, Gloucestershire GL16 8JP
properties.description: Sling Clubhouse is at the centre of the village both geographically and socially. Every Wednesday morning between 10am and 12 noon the Community Cafe welcomes all to enjoy a warm drink and homemade cake as well as good company.
properties.title: Sling Clubhouse

properties.address: St Christophers Church, Bulwark, Chepstow NP16, Monmouthshire NP16
properties.description: This space is open to all. Open Monday and Tuesday 10am -4pm. We have free tea, coffee, bread and sweet pastries. A book exchange, jigsaw puzzle, children’s toys and a friendly welcome.
properties.title: St Christopher’s Church Warm Space

properties.address: St Stephen's Church, Cinderford, Gloucestershire GL14 2AA
properties.description: Fridays are "Coffee Afternoon" with tea & coffee, cakes, chance to chat & browse the Fairtrade shop. There's a small creche area for young children to play (under supervision of their grown up). Sunday mornings, service begins at 11am & refreshments follow
properties.title: St Stephen's Church, Cinderford

properties.address: St Stephen's Church, Cinderford, Gloucestershire GL142 2AA

properties.address: St. Christopher's Church., Chepstow, Monmouthshire Np16 5eh Np16 5eh
properties.description: The space is open to all, of all faiths and none. We offer free bread and cakes to take away or eat in with tea or coffee. We always have a jigsaw puzzle on the go and we also run a free book exchange. We open from 10.00 till 4.00 every Monday and Tuesday
properties.title: St. Christopher's church warm zone

properties.address: Unit 1 Thomas Arcade, Chepstow, Monmouthshire NP16 5DH
properties.description: Located conveniently by the bus stop station in the heart of Chepstow, and just a ten-minute walk from the train station Our Warm Hub sessions run as follows: Tuesday: 7:00–8:30 pm (ADHD Peer Support) Thursday: 1:00–3:00 pm (Lego & Children’s Craft Activities) Friday: 9:00 am–12:00 pm (Needlework Activities Adults)
properties.title: The Green Room

properties.address: The Village Inn, Chepstow, Gwent NP16 7AA
properties.title: The Village Inn

properties.description: We welcome anyone who is passing and wants to pop in We meet in our main church space. It is easily accessible and open onto the main street, next to the Bus Station. Most weeks we also get bread, rolls and pastries from Lidl, so extra treats! Along with hot (or cold!) drinks and friendly chat.
properties.title: Warm&Cosy@CMC (Chepstow Methodist Church)
